24.title: "The Angouleme Convention"
24.author: Dana Jennings
24.appears_in: p. 100 in The Comics Journal, no. 89 (Mar. 1984)
notes: Brief general description of the 1983 International Salon of Comic Books (held Jan. 28-30, 1983). The first Salon had 10,000 attendees in 1974. Will Eisner won the "Grand Prize of the City of Angouleme" for lifetime achievement in 1975, and Jean Giraud, Reiser, Franquin and Paul Gillon are previous winners.
